publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7100 Stuart McMillan: Congratulations to Port Glasgowâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Port Glasgow Town Centre Tenants and Residents Association on winning a bronze medal at the Beautiful Scotland awards; notes that entrants were judged on the three criteria of horticultural achievement, environmental responsibility and community participation; further notes the hard work that the community has put in to successfully transform the local environment, and hopes that Port Glasgow can continue to build on this success. Supported by: Aileen Campbell*, Kenneth Gibson*, Rob Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Anne McLaughlin*
S3M-7100 Congratulations to Port Glasgow (lodged on 27 September 2010) Trish Godman*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-7100 Congratulations to Port Glasgow (lodged on 27 September 2010) Stewart Maxwell*, Jamie Hepburn*
